name: Awesome House 1
description: You are standing outside an awesome house.  You suspect there is a workshop inside, but you're not sure why.

name: Secret workshop
description: You are standing inside a hustling bustling workshop. You feel like you could forge items here.

name: Awesome House 2
description: You are standing outside an awesome house.  It's builder was the most awesome and doesn't care about grammar.

name: Awesome House
description: You are standing inside an awesome house.  Feel special.  There are lots of books.  The grammar is all wrong.
